lines.text: sorry Grandmadder can't be there til later, I'm working down at lockheed as a riveter signed Red Riding Hood, end quote.

[leaps onto a chandelier]
What's the matter with you puddin' head?
Sorry sir but that's what you said,
that's what he said, that's what the man said, he said that!

[noticing the wolf in bed with her]
Say who are you? you ain't the three old bears!
You bet I ain't honey but lordy who cares!
